complaint.description: No customer service! Unable to cancel unwanted recurring bundle and unable to get through to the contact centre.
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer service by providing better access to contact centre and resolving customer issues promptly.

meta.review_title: Telkom,no customer service! We must deal with a pre-recorded machine !!! machine
meta.review_content:
TELKOM is by far the worst network provider when it comes  to customer service! Why is such a hassle to get hold of them,I urgently need to cancel an unwanted recurring bundle which I am unable to do on the self service portal.So I try and try and TRY to contact their call centre who then automatically redirects me to use a whatsapp number which us of no use.
I cannot solve my problem with a robot!!
Why am I not able to get through to their contact centre and why should one always come to Hello Peter in order for Telkom to render a service.
